I18N.Title: The medium has no [ATTRIBUTENAME].
I18N.Translation: Die Sprache des Tons ist nicht bestimmt.
The language of the audio is not set.

I18N.Title: The medium has the [NUMBER] [ATTRIBUTENAME]s [SELECTION].
I18N.Translation: Der Ton ist in den [NUMBER] Sprachen [SELECTION] vorhanden.
Audio is available for the [NUMBER] languages [SELECTION].

I18N.Title: The medium has the [ATTRIBUTENAME] [SELECTION].
I18N.Translation: Audio is available for the language [SELECTION].

I18N.Title: The [ATTRIBUTENAME] is not set.
I18N.Translation: Die Sprache des Tons ist nicht bestimmt.
The language of the audio is not set.
